name: 鍾孟雲
objective:
本課程將從電子儀器的基礎操作訓練開始，學生將學習如何正確使用實驗室中常見的基本儀器，包括示波器、直流電源供應器、訊號產生器及數位萬用電表。課程中將強調儀器的功能原理、正確的接線方法、量測數據的解讀與分析，並結合常見故障排除技巧，以提升學生在實務應用中的操作能力與自信心。同時也會介紹基本的實驗室安全規範，強調電氣安全與設備保護觀念。學生將透過實驗設計並驗證電子學的直流偏壓、功率輸出與訊號波形，進而培養對功率放大器設計的初步理解。本課程著重理論與實作並重，旨在培養學生具備紮實的電子電路實驗技能與分析能力，為進階課程或未來工程實務奠定堅實基礎。
This course begins with fundamental training in the operation of electronic instruments, where students will learn how to properly use commonly used laboratory equipment such as oscilloscopes, DC power supplies, signal generators, and digital multimeters. Emphasis will be placed on understanding the functional principles of each instrument, correct wiring techniques, and the interpretation and analysis of measurement data. Additionally, the course will cover common troubleshooting methods to enhance students’ practical skills and confidence in real-world applications. Basic laboratory safety rules will also be introduced, with a focus on electrical safety and equipment protection. Through hands-on experiments, students will design and verify concepts related to DC biasing, power output, and signal waveforms in electronics, thereby developing a foundational understanding of power amplifier design. The course balances theory with practice and is designed to equip students with solid experimental and analytical skills in electronic circuits, laying a strong foundation for advanced coursework or future engineering practice.
